Class ElixirBar

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
ElixirBar
public class ElixirBar extends greenfoot.Actor
Elixir bar used in the game to track how much elixir each player has Indicates elixir through a bar filling up
Version:
Author:
Owen Lee
